sense.def:
One's view on a particular subject
je mnenje, ki ga ima človek o neki témi.

seg.quote: I've changed my view on this issue.
He was sent to jail for his political views.

sense.def:
One's view of something
je človekov odnos do nečesa in njegovo razumevanje tistega.

seg.quote: She has a view of life which is deeply corrupt.
He tends to take a wider, more overall view of things.

sense.def:
To view something in a particular way
pomeni razmišljati o nečem na določen način.

seg.quote: Their missiles are viewed as a defensive and deterrent force.

sense.def:
The view from a particular place
je vse, kar lahko vidimo z nekega kraja.

seg.quote: From the top there is a fine view.

sense.def:
To have a view of something
pomeni, da nekaj lahko vidimo.

To view something
pomeni nekaj gledati;

seg.quote: ...a drop of water from a pond, viewed through a microscope.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
in my view
poudarimo, da izražamo svoje lastno mnenje.

seg.quote: In my view, we have a long way to go before we have a United States of Europe.

sense.def:
To take the view that something is true
pomeni biti mnenja, da je nekaj resnično.

Z izrazom
in view of
uvedemo poglavitno dejstvo ali ključen dogodek, ki nas je navedel na to, da rečemo ali naredimo nekaj.

seg.quote: In view of the fact that all the other members of the group are going, I think you should go too.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo
with a view to a particular result
, tisto naredimo zato, da bi dosegli določen rezultat.

seg.quote: We have exchanged letters with a view to meeting to discuss these problems.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
in view
, tisto lahko vidimo od tam, kjer smo.

seg.quote: We crept around the cage to keep the monkey in view.

sense.def:
Kar je
on view
, je razstavljeno na javnem kraju.

seg.quote: The Turner exhibition is on view at the Tate Gallery.
